item.title: Street lights out on village road, 30th September
item.description:
Streetlight is out on village road, opposite new development and in front of 5/6 newdawn place. There are also other street lights out on village road. This is making it difficult to park at night due to busy road with people wearing dark clothing and cycling on the pavement so aren't always visible.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7, Newdawn Place, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
